rooms.description: Central space for family gatherings and dining. Designed with a Chettinad-style layout emphasizing open spaces and intricate carvings on door frames and window shutters.
Spacious bedroom with integrated walk-in closet and attached bathroom. Vastu aligned for positive energy flow and natural light.
Cozy guest room designed with traditional Chettinad motifs and adequate ventilation in accordance with local building norms.

Dedicated home office space optimized for productivity with ample natural lighting and minimal distraction. Vastu principles are followed by orienting the desk towards the north-east corner of the room.
Functional bathroom attached to the master bedroom, designed with local plumbing norms in mind and traditional Chettinad aesthetic details.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.features: Traditional Chettinad design with carved wooden door and ornamental detailing. Entry is oriented towards the east to harness morning sunlight, as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Window
openings.features: Large windows with louvered shutters for privacy, natural ventilation, and scenic view.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.features: Small balcony attached to the dining space offering an outdoor seating option and fresh air.

levels.level_description: Ground floor designed as a duplex townhouse following Chettinad style with emphasis on open living spaces, intricate design elements, and adherence to local building norms. Rooms are oriented considering Vastu principles for optimum energy flow. The layout efficiently utilizes the 50x80 feet plot ensuring a balance between modern amenities and traditional aesthetics.
